General.Name: Singbao International Co Ltd
General.Description: Shangya Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the wholesale of Chinese medicines, western medicines, medical equipment, slimming products, and beauty products in Taiwan. It is also involved in the research, development, production, and sale of wireless communication integrated circuits, satellite positioning systems, portable product ICs, etc.; and operation of various beauty salons, as well as provision of other services. The company was formerly known as Singbao International Co. Ltd and changed its name to Shangya Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2023. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 188, Nanjing East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10571
